accordion.title: What is AI-zadə?
accordion.desc: AI-zadə is an advanced AI assistant platform designed to offer a wide range of services, including email marketing, presentation creation, project management, and digital marketing assistance, tailored to enhance your productivity and efficiency.

accordion.title: How does AI-zadə work?
accordion.desc: AI-zadə works by leveraging artificial intelligence to understand and execute tasks based on user requests. Simply choose your assistant, select a plan, and start interacting with your AI through our user-friendly interface to receive personalized support.

accordion.title: How can I choose the right AI assistant for my needs?
accordion.desc: Each of our AI assistants specializes in different areas. Review the descriptions of our assistants—Adam, Sophia, Brahim, and Sara—to determine which one aligns with your specific needs. If you're unsure, our team is here to help you make the best choice.

accordion.title: What subscription plans are available?
accordion.desc: We offer various subscription plans to suit different requirements and budgets, ranging from basic to premium options. Each plan includes a specific number of requests per month, ensuring flexibility and scalability for all users.

accordion.title: Is my data secure with AI-zadə?
accordion.desc: Absolutely. Data security and privacy are our top priorities. We employ state-of-the-art encryption and follow strict data protection regulations to ensure your information remains confidential and secure at all times.

accordion.title: How can I get support if I encounter issues?
accordion.desc: Our dedicated support team is available 24/7 to assist you with any queries or issues. You can reach out via our email or phone. We're here to ensure a smooth and efficient experience with AI-zade
